description: This file defines the main UI screen for an Expense Tracker app built with Jetpack Compose. It includes UI components for displaying and editing expense/income transactions, summary cards for total income, expenses, and balance, month navigation, and a form for adding/editing transactions. The code manages state, renders lists of data, handles user interactions, and integrates with data models such as Item and Category.

classes.name: FormState
classes.description: Data class holding the state of the expense transaction form, including date, category, title, value, and editing ID.

methods.name: ExpenseTrackerScreen
methods.description: Main composable that renders the expense tracker interface, manages state, and integrates sub-components.

methods.name: MonthHeader
methods.description: Composable displaying the current month with navigation buttons for previous and next months.

methods.name: SummaryCards
methods.description: Component rendering summary cards for income, expenses, and balance.

methods.name: SummaryCard
methods.description: Displays individual summary data with title, value, and color accent.

methods.name: TransactionForm
methods.description: Form for adding or editing a transaction, with validation and submission handling.

methods.name: CategoryRow
methods.description: Renders a horizontal list of category filter chips.

methods.name: TransactionList
methods.description: Displays a list of transactions with options to edit or delete.

methods.name: hexToColor
methods.description: Converts a hexadecimal color string to a Compose Color object.
